title: Common resource properties (links)

href.description: This is the target URI, it can be specified as a Relative Reference or fully-qualified URI.

rel_array.description: The relation of the target URI referenced by the link to the context URI

rel_string.description: The relation of the target URI referenced by the link to the context URI

anchor.description: This is used to override the context URI e.g. override the URI of the containing collection.

p.description: Specifies the framework policies on the Resource referenced by the target URI

bm.description: Specifies the framework policies on the Resource referenced by the target URI for e.g. observable and discoverable

title.description: A title for the link relation. Can be used by the UI to provide a context.

ins.description: The instance identifier for this web link in an array of web links - used in collections

type.description: A hint at the representation of the resource referenced by the target URI. This represents the media types that are used for both accepting and emitting.

eps.description: the Endpoint information of the target Resource
